thread.title: Ivanka Trump's Perfume Sales Skyrocket on Amazon
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump's Perfume Sales Skyrocket on Amazon

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Ivanka Trump's Perfume Sales Skyrocket on Amazon
text:
Despite boycotts that are hurting sales , Ivanka Trump 's perfume topped the bestseller list in Amazon's beauty section on Saturday.
In fact, the first daughter's self-titled perfume took up the top two beauty spots, as of Saturday afternoon â€” the $34.99 and the $15 roll-on version.
According to the site , bestsellers are adjusted hourly so this could just be a momentary blip.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Us Weekly points out some of the reviews, which range from, praising it for its "beautiful, gentle, and ladylike" scent. While others say it has a "a fascist, demigauge [sic], racist smell to it...scent may have been motivated by daddy," and, "Terrible scent. Smells like communism." 2017 in a nutshell!
Follow Laura on Twitter .
